name: NoFrixion for WooCommerce
author: NoFrixion

sections.description:
The NoFrixion for WooCommerce plugin provides a convenient way to access the NoFrixion payment gateway.

Supported payment options are:

  • Card payments.
  • Open Banking (Europe only) payment initiation.
sections.installation: This plugin requires WooCommerce. Please make sure you have WooCommerce installed.
sections.faq: Documentation and an API reference can be found at https://docs.nofrixion.com.
sections.changelog:
1.2.4 :: 2024-01-29

  • Class autoloader fix.

1.2.3 :: 2023-10-23

  • Performance bug fix.

1.2.2 :: 2023-10-09

  • Dependancy fixes.

1.2.0 :: 2023-10-06

  • Add Pay by Bank and bug fixes.

1.1.29 :: 2023-02-03

  • Fix for duplicate card payment authorisations.

1.1.28 :: 2023-01-23

  • Fix for disappearing card payment fields.

1.1.27 :: 2023-01-20

  • Adjustment for new payelement headless fix.

1.1.26 :: 2023-01-03

  • Bug fixes.

1.1.25 :: 2022-12-20

  • Bug fixes.

1.1.24 :: 2022-11-27

  • Bug fixes and add pay with bank option.

1.1.23 :: 2022-11-03

  • Fix styles on card inputs.

1.1.21 :: 2022-10-20

  • Updates for MoneyMoov API changes.

1.1.15 :: 2022-09-28

  • Set customer email address for card payment.

1.1.14 :: 2022-05-26

  • Remove unneeded directories.

1.0.7 :: 2022-05-25

  • Initial release.
sections.reviews:
The most humiliating attention I have ever had.

By kriptonson on December 2, 2022

When you are born in the wrong country you get used to people looking at you differently, closing doors and making you look down on you because of your origins, it's my day to day life and I have learned to live with it. But to sum it up, these unpresentable people called me a drug dealer in a video conference when what I have done is work hard all my life. They wrote to me indicating that I could introduce them to clients but they couldn't work with me and when I asked to speak to the CEO they just threw the door in my face. Companies like these are what make the world an unbreathable place.
